TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_tasasa, title = tasasa, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/tasasa} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam:向下) tasasa ku culil na makabuyu'. 從山上往下走. kasienawan tasasa tu ku tataheciw nay buyu'. .
(kamo no holam:向下) tasasa ko colil na makaboyo'. 從山上往下走. kasienawan tasasa to ko tataheciw nay boyo'. .
